headline: Ask HN: How do I choose? Amazon vs. Late Stage Startup
description:
Alright, so this is piggybacking a bit off a recent discussion about friction at BigCo. here: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31669338

But I have a situation I would like to hear more opinions on because I honestly have no idea what to do.

A little context about me: - I am in my mid 20s, with no dependents. - I have only done software consulting as full-time employment. So this would be my first in-house software engineer position. - I have been contracting with Amazon for the past year.

Coming up in the next 2 weeks, I have a big decision on whether I should accept an offer from Amazon or Small Co (300 employees, 10+ years). The Amazon compensation would be around 20-30k higher per year but I am also really excited by the product that Small Co. is out to build and having worked on the Amazon team for a year I know that the work is un-fulfilling but easy.

Ultimately here is my question: Are the things I learn while building out a brand new product at Small Co worth more long term in my career than the compensation and brand name provided by Big Tech Co?

Additionally, I was told I only passed the interview because I had worked for the team and done well but was a sub-par interviewee. Should I take the barrier to entry into consideration here?

Thank you in advance for taking the time to respond!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 我如何选择？亚马逊与晚期创业公司
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 我如何選擇？亞馬遜與晚期創業公司
description_zh-Hans:
好吧，所以这是对最近在BigCo.这里关于摩擦的讨论的一点回馈：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31669338

但我有一个情况，我想听到更多的意见，因为我真的不知道该怎么做。

关于我的一点背景。 - 我今年20多岁，没有受抚养人。 - 我只做过软件咨询，是全职工作。因此，这将是我的第一个内部软件工程师职位。 -

在接下来的两个星期里，我有一个重大的决定，就是我应该接受亚马逊还是小公司（300名员工，10年以上）的邀请。亚马逊的报酬每年会高出2-3万左右，但我也对Small Co.要打造的产品感到非常兴奋，在亚马逊团队工作了一年后，我知道这项工作虽然没有成就感，但很轻松。

最终，我的问题是这样的。我在小公司打造全新产品时学到的东西在我的职业生涯中是否比大公司提供的报酬和品牌更有长远价值？

另外，我被告知我只通过了面试，因为我曾为该团队工作并表现良好，但却是一个不合格的面试者。在这里，我是否应该把进入的障碍考虑在内？

提前感谢您抽出时间来回答！

"我是说，我是说，我是说。
